jokes.text: Why did the broke man bring a ladder to the bar? Because he heard the drinks were on the house!
I finally figured out how to live on nothing – I just can’t afford it.
Why don’t broke people tell secrets? Because they can’t keep a bank account!
I’m not saying I’m broke, but my bank account looks like it’s been through a zombie apocalypse.
They say money talks… Mine just waves goodbye.
My wallet is like an onion – every time I open it, it makes me cry.
Being broke teaches you one thing: the value of a 'free sample'.
Why don’t broke people gamble? They can’t afford to lose!
I used to think money could buy happiness – now I just want it to buy me groceries.
I'm so broke, I can't even afford to pay attention.
Why did the poor person start a gardening business? Because they wanted to grow their own money!
Why did the poor guy always carry a pencil? Because he couldn't afford a pen!
Being poor is like being in a relationship – there's always more drama than you'd like.
Why did the poor man stare at the can of orange juice? Because it said 'concentrate'!
When I was broke, I used to tell people I was on a 'no cash diet'.
Why did the broke student eat their homework? Because their teacher said it was a piece of cake!
Why do broke people never play hide and seek? Because good luck hiding when you're always seeking!
My bank account is like a magician: it makes my money disappear!
Why don't poor people use calendars? Because they can’t afford the days!
I used to be rich… and then I went shopping!
Why do broke people always carry a shovel? Because they're always digging themselves deeper!
My financial strategy? Close my eyes and hope for the best!
Why did the poor man break up with his girlfriend? Because she was a gold digger!
Why do broke people make terrible detectives? Because they can never find the cash!
I'm so broke, I can't even afford to be late!
Why did the broke guy bring a ladder to the grocery store? To reach the high prices!
Why don't broke people tell jokes? Because they can't afford to laugh!
I told my wallet to stop being empty, but it just gave me the silent treatment.
Why did the poor man always carry a suitcase? Because he was ready to pack up his problems!
Why don’t broke people ever get lost? Because they can’t afford to go anywhere!
I'm not broke; I'm just financially challenged!
Why did the poor guy get a job as a janitor? Because he wanted to sweep his problems away!
Why did the broke man look at his bank statement like a horror movie? Because it was scary!
My financial advisor told me to invest in myself, but I can’t even afford a haircut!
I wanted to save money, so I bought a piggy bank – and now I’m broke with a pig!
Why do poor people love nature? Because it’s free!
I’m so broke that even my shadow leaves me at night!
Why did the broke person always take the stairs? Because they couldn’t afford the elevator!
My money is like a magician – it disappears right before my eyes!
Why don’t broke people play the lottery? Because they can’t afford the ticket!
I’m on a seafood diet. I see food, and I can’t afford it!
Why did the poor man become a chef? He wanted to make a little dough!
Why do broke people make great comedians? Because they can turn their struggles into punchlines!
I’m so broke that I can’t even pay attention in class!
Why did the poor man bring a pencil to bed? He wanted to draw his dreams!
Why do broke people always carry a water bottle? Because they can't afford to buy drinks!
I wanted to buy a new car, but my wallet said, 'not today!'
Why did the broke person take up knitting? They wanted to stitch together their finances!
I'm not poor; I'm just economically challenged!
Why do broke people make great actors? Because they know how to play the part!
Why did the broke person always bring a snack to work? To avoid spending money on lunch!
I’m so broke, my bank account is just a sad little emoji!
Why did the poor man always wear a raincoat? Because he was always saving for a rainy day!
Why don’t broke people go to the gym? Because they can’t afford the membership!
Why did the broke man refuse to play the guitar? Because he couldn’t afford the strings!
I'm so broke, my budget is a wish list!
Why did the broke man start a blog? To earn a little interest!
Why do broke people love coffee? Because it helps them stay awake during their job search!
I used to think I was bad at saving money, but it turns out I’m just really good at spending it!
Why did the poor person always wear old shoes? Because they couldn’t afford to step up!
I told my wallet to stop being empty, but it just laughed!
Why did the broke person become a librarian? Because they love checking out books!
Why did the broke student ace their math exam? Because they’re great at counting pennies!
I’m not broke; I’m just saving up for a really long time!
Why do poor people love to cook? Because they want to make the most of their ingredients!
Why did the broke person stare at their bank statement? Because they were hoping for a miracle!
Why don’t broke people go out to eat? Because they can’t afford the bill!
I wanted to start a savings account, but my wallet laughed in my face!
Why did the broke person take a nap? Because they needed to dream of a better life!
Why do broke people make great friends? Because they know how to share their struggles!
I’m so broke, even my dreams are on a budget!
Why did the poor man try to sell his old shoes? He was hoping for a sole-mate!
Why do broke people love shopping sales? Because they can afford to be picky!
I'm so broke, I can't even afford to be lazy!
Why did the broke person join a band? Because they wanted to get some free food!
Why did the poor man bring a spoon to the bank? He wanted to stir up some cash!
Why did the broke person always carry a calculator? Because they wanted to count their blessings!
Why did the broke student bring a ladder to school? To reach their academic goals!
I’m so broke, I can’t even afford to donate to my own cause!
Why did the poor man get a job at the circus? He wanted to be part of a 'ring' of friends!
Why do broke people love to volunteer? Because it gives them a chance to feel rich in spirit!
Why did the broke person always carry a map? Because they were lost in their finances!
I’m so broke, my wallet is just a piece of cardboard!
Why did the poor man open a bakery? He wanted to make a little dough!
Why do broke people love nature walks? Because they’re free!
I’m not broke; I’m just financially unique!
Why did the broke person go to the beach? Because it was a free getaway!
Why do poor people love movies? Because they can escape their reality for a while!
Why did the broke man take up painting? He wanted to color his world!
I'm so broke, I can't even afford to cry!
Why did the poor man always carry an umbrella? Because he was always expecting a rain of bills!
Why do broke people love the library? Because it’s full of free stories!
Why did the broke person join a gym? They wanted to work out their budget!
Why did the poor man always check the couch for change? Because it was his treasure hunt!
Why do broke people always have good advice? Because they’ve been through it all!
I’m so broke, I can't even afford to break even!
Why did the broke person love thrift stores? Because they could find hidden gems!
Why do poor people love puzzles? Because they can put their lives together!
Why did the broke man bring a fishing pole to the bank? He wanted to catch some interest!
When you're poor, you can relate to math class: it feels like you're always subtracting something.
